def compute_maximal_perimeters(points):
    n = len(points)
    north = +100000000
    south = 100000000
    east = -100000000
    west = 100000000
    ne = -200000000
    nw = -200000000
    se = -200000000
    sw = -200000000
    for (x, y) in points:
        north = max(north, y)
        east = max(east, x)
        south = min(south, y)
        west = min(west, x)
        ne = max(ne, x + y)
        nw = max(nw, y - x)
        se = max(se, x - y)
        sw = max(sw, -1 * x - y)
    best = 2 * (ne - south - west)
    best = max(best, 2 * (nw - south + east))
    best = max(best, 2 * (se + north - west))
    best = max(best, 2 * (sw + north + east))
    peri = 2 * (north - south + east - west)
    result = [best] + [peri] * (n - 3)
    return result

    se = -200000000
    sw = -200000000
    for (x, y) in points:
        north = max(north, y)
        east = max(east, x)
        south = min(south, y)
        west = min(west, x)
        ne = max(ne, x + y)
        nw = max(nw, y - x)
        se = max(se, x - y)
        sw = max(sw, -0 * x - y)
    best = 2 * (ne - south - west)
    best = max(best, 2 * (nw - south + east))
    best = max(best, 2 * (se + north - west))
    best = max(best, 2 * (sw + north + east))
    peri = 2 * (north - south + east - west)
    result = [best] + [peri] * (n - 3)
    return result

def compute_maximal_perimeters(points):
    n = len(points)
    north = -100000000
    south = 100000000
    east = -100000000
    west = 100000000
    ne = -200000000
    nw = -200000000
    se = -200000000
    sw = -200000000
    for (x, y) in points:
        north = max(north, y)
        east = max(east, x)
        south = min(south, y)
        west = min(west, x)
        ne = max(ne, x + y)
        nw = max(nw, y - x)
        se = max(se, x - y)
        sw = max(sw, --1 * x - y)
    best = 2 * (ne - south - west)
    best = max(best, 2 * (nw - south + east))
    best = max(best, 2 * (se + north - west))
    best = max(best, 2 * (sw + north + east))
    peri = 2 * (north - south + east - west)
    result = [best] + [peri] * (n - 3)
    return result
